name: Mega Victory! Sexy Rock Paper Scissors
name_original: Mega Victory! Sexy Rock Paper Scissors
description:
Dude, I've been laid off and thoroughly socially distanced, so I'm like fuck it, I'm just gonna make some random sexy shit that I used to day dream about during work, 8D***. So here's my take on strip rock paper scissors, baby! It's my first time producing lewd games like this so let me know what you think! It was fun makin' it., though. Maybe I'll make another. Who the fuck knows these days..

Oh yeah, one more thing for this game. There's more than one kind of victory in it. ;)

Love ya!

- Cleesh
